Title: Relates to prescription drugs in Medicaid managed care programs; repealer
Summary: Relates to prescription drugs in Medicaid managed care programs.
LawCode: Add §365-i, rpld §364-j subs 25 & 25-a, Soc Serv L; amd §§2511, 270 & 272, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public health law, in relation to prescription drugs in Medicaid managed care programs; and to repeal certain provisions of the social services law, relating to payments for prescription drugs
